text: Lego Harry Potter was a LEGO series. It was based on the Harry Potter movies. Models of important scenes, vehicles and people were made for the first five movies. It was created in the year 2001. This was the same time the first Harry Potter movie, Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone, was released. In May 2009, LEGO said that a video game called LEGO Harry Potter: Years 1-4 is being developed. They also said it would be released in 2010.Official LEGO Harry Potter: Years 1-4 Trailer == References == Category:Harry Potter Category:Lego
title: Lego Harry Potter
